name: Postable
description: Picture this, [insert_favorite_social_media_site] but with HTML! Using state of the art security, we can even make sure that it's 200% safe. There is no way you could steal the admin's cookies. http:/{{server}}:{{port}}/source
hints: Small steps. Think about what you need in order to be able to fully extract the admin's cookies.
author: Zachary Wade
